message:
hello,
did anyone here try to make a program that uses proxy to connect to a website ?
am trying to do that but i keep failing.
i already tried Java
using jsoup and System.getProperties, it works but some websites detect my real ip (ex google , yahoo, ... )

data.message: How did you try that ? do you have some code some where to look at ?

hi, about my problem i fixed it by using python instead of java.
and it worked the way i wanted it to  :)
but i still don't understand how google/other websites can detect me when i used java, but not when i use python

I haven't used Jsoup before, but i took a quick glance into the source code 

https://github.com/jhy/jsoup/blob/master/src/main/java/org/jsoup/helper/HttpConnection.java

It seems that the proxy properties need to be set using connection.proxy(). so the reason might be that jsoup ignored the proxy system properties, and you didn't provide any proxy to the connection.

try adding .proxy( .... ) before the .execute()
thank you for your time, i noted that.
